clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Viomycin is an essential component in the drug cocktail currently used to fight infections of Mycobacterium tuberculosis

incompatibilities.description: The therapeutic efficacy of Succinylcholine can be increased when used in combination with Viomycin
